Description: Dean Vendetta 4.0 Electric Guitar with Floyd Rose, Classic White w/ Deluxe Case Click images to enlarge Description Welcome to Our-Great-Goods! Dean Vendetta 4.0 Electric Guitar with Floyd Rose, Classic White w/ Deluxe Case In very nice used condition!! This was identified by pictures: please take a good look, not positive my description is totally correct Dean's Vendetta 4 electric guitar is made from solid mahogany with a quilted maple top and maple neck-thru construction that provide jaw-dropping good looks and amazing, fat sound. Mahogany's warm tone and sustain meets the bright edge of maple for a full spectrum of tone. Powerful Dean USA DMT Time Capsule humbuckers faithfully carry every shred and crunch to your amp. Your pilot's license is waiting in the form of the guitar's Floyd Rose-licensed tremolo, fueled up and ready to dive-bomb the very next crowd you play for. Razor wire style inlay will inspire you to really tear it up. FEATURES Neck through construction Solid mahogany body with quilted maple top and back Maple neck with rosewood fingerboard Dean USA DMT Time Capsule humbuckers Licensed Floyd Rose tremolo system Classic Dean V Ferrule pattern 24 frets 25-1/2" scale Nickel hardware In very good used condition, minor scratches.  I really can't find anything really wrong with this, looks great.  Has been stored and the strings look like they have a residue, you will probably want to replace the strings. Noticed one chip on the front near some of the hardware, see photo. Included: Dean Vendetta 4.0 Electric Guitar with Floyd Rose, Classic White w/ Deluxe Case, extra bolts, pick, strap, key to case and allen wrenches.  All pictured is included!
